nodes.bodyText:
@david-allison-1 @mikehardy
FYI, we don't usually end strings with a period in AnkiDroid unless it consists of multiple sentences.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -200,4 +200,15 @@
     <!-- Boot Service -->
     <string name="boot_service_failed_to_schedule_notifications">Failed to schedule reminders</string>
     <string name="boot_service_too_many_notifications">Too many reminders scheduled. Some will not appear</string>
+
+    <!--Sync-->
+    <plurals name="sync_automatic_sync_needs_more_time">
+        <item quantity="zero">An automatic sync may be triggered in %d seconds.</item>

nodes.bodyText:
Also you don't need to specify redundant plural forms in English. Crowdin will provide the extra forms for those languages that require them. See the deckpicker_title for an example:
English vs. Polish

nodes.bodyText: Thanks! Will add these to the docs
